channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Officials work to unravel how and why gunman carried out deadly attack on NYC office building
item.description: Investigators are piecing together more details about how a former high school football player who blamed the game for his mental health problems carried out a deadly attack on an office building that is home to the NFL.

item.title: Victims of New York City shooting include a police officer and an executive at investment firm
Questions emerge about NYC gunmanâ€™s mental health and his security-sensitive job in Las Vegas
